# ProximityReaderDiscovery.Content

**Structure**

A type that represents content you can display on the current device.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Content
```

## Overview

This structure stores information the system needs to present the appropriate interface. Don’t create instances of this structure directly. Instead, fetch each instance using the [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/ProximityReaderDiscovery/content(for:)] method.

Pass instances of this structure to [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/ProximityReaderDiscovery/presentContent(_:from:)] to display the associated content.

## Getting the content identifier

- **id**: The unique identifier of the content.

## Getting the content description

- **description**: The description of the content.

## Fetching the content to display

- **content(for:)**: Fetches the content for the specified topic.
- **ProximityReaderDiscovery.Topic**: The topics you can present to someone.
- **contentList**: The content you can present for the current device.

## Conforms To

- Identifiable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
